Package org.apache.activemq.artemis.spi.core.remoting.ssl

Class SSLContextConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.activemq.artemis.spi.core.remoting.ssl.SSLContextConfig
  • public final class SSLContextConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds configuration parameters for SSL context initialization. To be used with SSLContextFactory and OpenSSLContextFactory.
    Use builder() to create new immutable instances.
